<h1 align="center">
How to use
</h1>

1. Clone repo from GitHub in the command line
```
git clone https://github.com/d-kilc/trip-builder.git
```

2. Navigate to the folder that has been created on your machine
```
cd /path/to/folder/trip-builder
```

3. Install dependencies with npm
```
npm install
```

3. Run the application locally
```
gatsby develop
```

4. Navigate to localhost:8000 in the browser of your choice
